title: Bang Bang Long Chudong season5
synopsis: Anzai, Zuer, and Lucas are three children who are curious and fantasizing about dinosaurs. They often visit the Dinosaur Museum, and then under the remote guidance of Banglong Weiss, they will come to Dinosaur Life through the museum’s secret passage Planet. On the planet, children will follow Bangbanglong to explore the world of dinosaurs. They will see the extinct dinosaurs in various prehistoric periods, and even have close contact with some dinosaurs! And whenever there is an emergency or danger, Bangbanglong will always protect the children and help the dinosaurs who encounter problems get out of trouble. After exploring the planet again and again, the children learned about various dinosaurs from different angles, satisfied their curiosity and fantasy, and also developed a deep friendship with Bangbanglong. (translated from bilibili)
